DataElement.preferredDefinition: The character string identifier in an external information system for the general class describing the level of disease of any human biologic material sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Category; used informally to mean a class of things._Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
